Find your future with us.Boeing Defense Space and Security (BDS) is seeking a Satellite Systems Mission Software Products Senior Manager for their Space and Launch Engineering team.  The selected candidate will have the option to work in El Segundo, CA or any of the other listed locations.The successful candidate will have the opportunity to lead a diverse technical team of experts providing government and commercial space customers with the most advanced technological satellite software systems in the world.  Our team leverages insight, innovation, performance and value to design and build the future of space! Position Responsibilities: Manages employees and mid-level managers performing engineering and technical activities in the area of Software Engineering.Develops and executes integrated organizational plans, policies and procedures and guides the development of business and technical strategies, goals, objectives.Acquires resources for organizational activities, provides technical management of suppliers and leads process improvements.Develops and maintains relationships and partnerships with customers, stakeholders, peers, partners and direct reports.Provides oversight and approval of technical approaches, products and processes.Manages, develops and motivates employees and mid-level managers.Performs staffing function for software engineering discipline across a diverse program portfolioProvides oversight and approval of technical approaches, products and processes.Inspires continuous improvement, safety, and quality in engineeringDrives change, efficiency, innovative process improvement, and exploration of new technologiesContributes to the success of the larger Space and Launch Software Development and Integration Engineering CapabilityThis position is currently expected to be 100% onsite.  The selected candidate will be required to work onsite at one of the listed location options. This position requires an active U.S. Security Clearance with a current Tier 5 (T5), formerly known as Single Scope Background Investigation (SSBI), (U.S. Citizenship required) (A U.S. Security Clearance that has been active in the past 24 months is considered active) Basic Qualifications (Required Skills / Experience):Bachelor of Science degree from an accredited course of study, in Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, Computer Science or other technical degree.5 or more years of experience managing/leading diverse teams5 or more years of experience in the software development full lifecyclePreferred Qualifications (Desired Skills / Experience):Experience maintaining relationships and partnerships with customers, stakeholders, peers, partners and direct reportsExperience developing ground software products which perform satellite mission management, satellite command and control, and satellite operational supportExperience with Agile/SAFe software developmentExperience with Continuous Integration (CI)Relocation:This position offers relocation based on candidate eligibility.
